divs: Sighting DetailsMy lady friend and me were walking home from somewhere. When we were in the pre-school parking lot I saw my lady friend look up. Then I looked up seconds later, and I saw a perfectly round disc shaped object directly over my head. As soon as I saw it it was already speeding away straight up. Actually I just got a glimps of it, but could see it had pink and violet swirls on it that seemed to be alive. It measured about 2 feet in diameter. It quickly disappeared into space.
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Anaheim
There were no other sightings in Anaheim on or around February 14th 1991
Summary: My lady friend saw it first but said nothing.
